channel.title: Npc clipping
channel.description: How can i stop NPCs from no clipping while following someone, such as you range a NPC over a fence and he walks through the fence and attacks the player. Can someone tell me how to stop this?

item.title: Npc clipping

item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

what would i search for? I have tried npc clipping under the tutorial section and only got a tutorial on how to add anti-fire potions.
